text:
🇪🇺 Our @EPPGroup has put forward a bold 10 billion € proposal to increase #vaccine production as part of our 10-step strategy to overcome #COVID19.

📜 Read Chairman @ManfredWeber and Vice-Chairwoman @Esther_de_Lange's statement on how we plan to get it done "whatever it takes": https://t.co/yxt4iUBOC3
